channel.title: Software on Xiao's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Xiao's blog

item.title: VS code install and settings.
item.description: 1. Extensions: LaTeX Workshop Markdown Preview Enhanced 2. setting.json { "workbench.colorTheme": "Monokai", "editor.fontSize": 16, // LaTeX // onFileChange, onSave, never "latex-workshop.latex.autoBuild.run": "never", "latex-workshop.message.error.show": false, "latex-workshop.message.warning.show": false, "latex-workshop.latex.tools": [ { "name": "xelatex", "command": "xelatex", "args": [ "-synctex=1", "-interaction=nonstopmode", "-file-line-error", "%DOCFILE%" ] }, { "name": "pdflatex", "command": "pdflatex", "args": [ "-synctex=1", "-interaction=nonstopmode", "-file-line-error", "%DOCFILE%" ] }, { "name": "bibtex", "command": "bibtex", "args": [ "%DOCFILE%" ] } ], "latex-workshop.latex.recipes": [ { "name": "pdflatex", "tools": [ "pdflatex" ] }, { "name": "pdf->bib->pdf->pdf", "tools": [ "pdflatex", "bibtex", "pdflatex", "pdflatex" ] }, { "name": "xe->bib->xe->xe", "tools": [ "xelatex", "bibtex", "xelatex", "xelatex" ] }, { "name": "xelatex", "tools": [ "xelatex" ], } ], "latex-workshop.

item.title: Sublime text 3 install and settings on WIN10.
item.description: 1. Install Softwares Sublime text 3 Texlive SumatraPDF Add paths to system environment variables, including E:\Sublime3\ E:\Sublime3\SumatraPDF\ E:\TexLive\2019\ 2. Sublime Settings 1. Package Control ctrl + shift + p Type Install Package Control, press enter 2. Latextools - latex ctrl + shift + p Type Package Control: Install Package, press enter Type Latextools, press enter Find LaTeXTools.sublime-settings under Latextools folder "texpath" : "C:\\texlive\\2019\\bin\\win32;$PATH", "distro" : "texlive", "sumatra" : "E:\\Sublime3\\SumatraPDF\\SumatraPDF.
